transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ranjit ji?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Main Hari Om Trading Company se bol raha hun.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji boliye sir.
Executive: Mere catalog mein ek product inactive kyun dikha raha hai? Rejected dikha raha hai, usme kya issues hai? Product issue karke red mark karke aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute main abhi bata deta hun sir.

Executive: Master Touch Pitambari Powder 175 gram correct?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Product issue.
Executive: Sir isme jo label laga hai woh aapka hi hai na?
Customer: Kaunsa? Jo upar jo label hai woh?
Executive: Haan Hari Om Industry ke naam se hi hai.
Customer: Ji haan woh hamare production wing hai. Matlab Hari Om Industries jo hai woh maal banati hai aur uska saara maal Hari Om Trading Company jo hai woh authorized distributor hai.
Executive: Ji sir mujhe jahan tak lag raha hai sir yeh jo company ka mismatch hua hai iske wajah se yeh is cheez ko hataya kyunki IndiaMART mein sir aap proper tarike se jo bhi product list hota hai na sir hum usme koi bhi contact detail ya fir name company ka matlab ki aapke company se match kar jaise ki yahan par agar Hari Om Trading likha hota toh yeh shayad reject nahi hota aap samajh gaye? But yahan par haan.
Customer: Ek second, mera trader profile hai.
Executive: Correct haan.
Customer: Theek hai, main bahut saari companyon ka product laata hun, bahut saari companyon ka product list karta hun.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Mera khud ka manufacturing profile toh hai nahi.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Toh mera naam product ke upar likhe hue manufacturer ke naam se kaise match karega?
Executive: Main samajh gaya sir uske liye mujhe discuss karna padega ki iska kya ho sakta hai ya fir aapke jo 15 active product hai.
Customer: Na usme dekhiye aap, active product mein aa jaiye.
Executive: Ek minute sir.
Executive: Isme mujhe ek aur issue lag raha hai mobile number ka bhi lag raha hai. Ek minute main dusre mein check kar leta hun.
Executive: Isme mobile number bhi aapka updated hai.
Executive: Jaise Master Touch ho gaya, Master ho gaya, fir yeh Ultra side set ho gaya, touch ho gaya. Ah, okay. Kisi bhi product mein agar aap
Customer: Haan main dekh liya, main aapko batata hun. Active product mein aap aaiye sabse pehla product hai Master Touch detergent liquid 5 liter.
Executive: Correct. Correct.
Customer: Uspe bhi dekhiye Hari Om Industries ka logo hai.
Executive: Haan mujhe yeh cheez haan correct logo hai.
Customer: Theek hai toh fir sir main bata deta hun aap main samajh gaya isme sir Hari Om Industry ka issue nahi hai isme jo dekhiye sir mobile number jisme mention hai ek baar aap koshish kijiye na ki is image ko hata ke ya fir is image mein na matlab karke jo customer care number dikh raha hai aur email ID dekh raha hai in dono ko ek baar remove karke photo lagaiye dekhiyega yeh product reject nahi hoga sir.
Customer: Aapki baat sahi hai.
Customer: Chaliye maine yeh ek product ke liye kar liya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Main yeh ah yeh morph fir kya hoga har product jo aisa koi aayega producer ki detail toh upar dikhegi na sir aap kyun fir usme.
Executive: Mobile number allowed. Mobile number allowed nahi hai sir main sach mein aapko yeh cheez bata raha hun IndiaMART mein na pehle yeh cheez tha ki hum log na jo bhi product mein mobile number hota tha mention log dekhte the call kar dete the theek hai wahi se but IndiaMART mein jab se AI system hamara jab se chalu hua hai sir woh automatically capture search kar raha hai ki kis image mein mobile number ya fir yeh cheez data hai un saare product ko woh reject kar raha hai aur isi ke wajah se yeh product aapka yahan par pada hua hai sir.
Customer: Woh toh possible hi nahi hai sir bahut saare product ke aapke website ke upar product ke upar mobile number toh nahi woh toh mandatory product ah cheez hai.
Executive: Aap mujhe sir ek baar screenshot bhejiye aap mujhe ek baar bhejiye sir main bhi ek baar go through karunga theek hai aisa nahi ho sakta sir kyunki agar aapka hua hai toh sabka bhi hua hoga sir.
Customer: Aap mujhe bhejo sir ek do logon ka aap mujhe bhejo.
Executive: Aap aap ek kaam kijiye thoda time le lijiye aur mujhe proper bataiye ki kis wajah se reject hua kyunki aap jo jo bhi reason aap bata rahe ho na woh kahin se bhi mujhe fit baithta nahi dikh raha hai.
Executive: Theek hai aap mujhe half an hour matlab ki aadha ghanta dijiye main aapko proper aap time nikal ke pura iska reason nikaliye kyunki yeh dono mein se ek bhi reason nahi ho sakta iske reject hone ka.
Customer: Producers ki detail jo hai dekhiye producers ki detail jo hai woh mandatory hai kisi bhi product ke packaging ke upar woh aani hi aani hai jaise ki aap multiple photograph post karoge toh product ka front photo aayega back photo aayega side photo aayega har jagah pe kahin na kahin manufacturer ka naam address mobile number email ID hona hi hona hai.
Customer: Kitni product ke upar apan photo edit karte jayenge aur aisa nahi ho sakta agar photo edit karke dalenge toh jo buyer jo samne jo inquiry kar raha hai usko doubt jayega ki aisa kya tha jo yahan pe mita diya in logon ne.
Customer: Woh cheez toh nahi ho sakti na sir.
Executive: Main samajh gaya aapki baat agar aapko mera aur yeh government mandatory details hai.
Customer: Woh toh har cheez mein aani hi aani hai kisi bhi product ka packaging aap utha ke dekh lo uske andar itni teen cheeze toh likhni padegi sabko.
Customer: Toh aap proper workout kar lijiye aadha ghanta lijiye lekin mere ko proper reason bataiye ke yeh inactive kyun hai aur usme jo bhi dikkat hai woh sort out kijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir main aapko yeh do reason toh nahi ho sakte theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai no issue main abhi aapko 15-20 minute mein hi aapko main bata deta hun discuss karke theek hai okay.
Executive: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's product is inactive in the catalog.

- Wants to know the reason for rejection.

- Doubts the reason for rejection.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the product details.

- Suggested removing contact details from the image.

- Asked to share screenshots of products with mobile numbers.

- Promised to investigate and provide a proper reason.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in 15-20 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product rejection, catalog, mobile number, product listing
